DOC.brief_summary: The aim study provide evidence clinical efficacy SmartMouth Advanced Clinical Formula mouthrinse comparison efficacy 0.12 % chlorhexidine mouthrinse placebo mouthrinse . The placebo provide sponsor identical SmartMouth ACF ( Advanced Clinical Formula ) , except contain cetylpyridinium chloride , zinc chloride sodium chlorite . The primary outcome include measure plaque gingivitis . Secondary outcome include evaluation tooth discoloration , taste perception , malodor calculus .
